annotation.spannedText: Tetanus vaccine can help prevent tetanus disease, commonly known as "lockjaw

classMention.mentionClass: Tetanus vaccine can help prevent tetanus disease, commonly known as "lockjaw

annotation.spannedText: Tdap should be given as a one-time booster in place of Td

classMention.mentionClass: Tdap should be given as a one-time booster in place of Td

annotation.spannedText: Tdap is especially important for those in close contact with infants

classMention.mentionClass: Tdap is especially important for those in close contact with infants

annotation.spannedText: Preteens and teens 11 through 18 years old (preferably at age 11-12 years old) should receive a single dose of Tdap

classMention.mentionClass: Preteens and teens 11 through 18 years old (preferably at age 11-12 years old) should receive a single dose of Tdap

annotation.spannedText: Adults 19 years or older who did not receive Tdap as a preteen or teen should also receive a single dose of Tdap

classMention.mentionClass: Adults 19 years or older who did not receive Tdap as a preteen or teen should also receive a single dose of Tdap

annotation.spannedText: Pregnant women should receive a dose of Tdap during each pregnancy, preferably at 27 through 36 weeks to maximize that amount of protective antibodies passed to the baby, but the vaccine can be safely given at any time during pregnancy

classMention.mentionClass: Pregnant women should receive a dose of Tdap during each pregnancy, preferably at 27 through 36 weeks to maximize that amount of protective antibodies passed to the baby, but the vaccine can be safely given at any time during pregnancy

annotation.spannedText: New mothers who have never gotten Tdap should get a dose as soon as possible after delivery

classMention.mentionClass: New mothers who have never gotten Tdap should get a dose as soon as possible after delivery

annotation.spannedText: Tdap should also be given to 7 through 10-year-olds who are not fully immunized against pertussis

classMention.mentionClass: Tdap should also be given to 7 through 10-year-olds who are not fully immunized against pertussis

annotation.spannedText: The dose of Tdap can be given earlier than the 10-year mark, so it's a good idea for adults to talk to a doctor about what's best for their specific situation

classMention.mentionClass: The dose of Tdap can be given earlier than the 10-year mark, so it's a good idea for adults to talk to a doctor about what's best for their specific situation

annotation.spannedText: Make sure you and your child are protected against tetanus. Vaccine Information Statements (VIS) for the Td vaccine, the TdaP vaccine, or the DTaP vaccine describe the benefits and risks of each vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Make sure you and your child are protected against tetanus. Vaccine Information Statements (VIS) for the Td vaccine, the TdaP vaccine, or the DTaP vaccine describe the benefits and risks of each vaccine

annotation.spannedText: These sheets are required to be given each time you receive a vaccine dose

classMention.mentionClass: These sheets are required to be given each time you receive a vaccine dose
